actionConfiguration.body:
select
s.total_missed,
s.total_patched,
s.total_patchable,
round((s.total_missed  / s.total_patchable::decimal) * 100, 2) as missed_pct,
round((s.total_patched  / s.total_patchable::decimal) * 100, 2) as patched_pct
from
(select count(distinct ps.complete_host) total_patched,
max(p.total_hosts) as "total_patchable",
max(p.total_hosts) - count(distinct ps.complete_host)  as "total_missed"
FROM patching_status ps
 JOIN (select 'Total_patchable' stat_name ,count( distinct target_name) Total_hosts FROM population_patchable ) p ON 1 = 1
 ) s
 ;
